SD_ROM.synopsis: Romance with Halsin. The player meets Halsin in a quiet outdoor area (a city park/small grove, Somewhere with trees and greenery) once they've romantically bonded with him. A romance scene ensues. Halsin, aroused, briefly lapses into bear form. The player can encourage him to remain in that form or that of an elf.
SD_ROM.how_to_trigger: Start a relationship with Halsin, go to bed that night in camp.

SD_ROM_20.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_20.text: You came. I was concerned you might have had doubts. Or that this might have all been too soon...
SD_ROM_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player finds Halsin waiting under a tree. He spots them, eager and a little relieved.

SD_ROM_58.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_58.text: Put your doubts aside. I'm here.

SD_ROM_16.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_16.text: Yes you are. And you're perfect.

SD_ROM_57.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_57.text: Too soon? No - I've been waiting a long time for this.

SD_ROM_39.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_39.text: As have I. It's been worth the wait.

SD_ROM_36.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_36.text: Why, is the big, strong Archdruid Halsin nervous? Adorable.

SD_ROM_5.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_5.text: Perhaps a little. Do you know how hard it's been for me to contain myself?

SD_ROM_51.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_51.text: I'm almost frightened to touch you - if I give in, I may not be able to stop until I have devoured you.

SD_ROM_24.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_24.text: Of course. What else do you think I'm here for?

SD_ROM_21.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] He reaches with both hands towards the front of his own clothing and grips. Camera focuses on the player as there is a sudden off-screen rip of fabric. They gape, despite themselves.

Halsin stands before them, naked. He looks at the player like someone dying of thirst would look upon a mountain spring.

SD_ROM_29.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_29.text: Or at least I will try.

SD_ROM_46.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_46.text: As I do you. But nevertheless, I will be gentle.

SD_ROM_38.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_38.text: Almost frightened. If you feel my heart quicken, it's not from fear.

SD_ROM_12.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_12.text: Just as nature intended. Come here to me -
SD_ROM_12.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin's approving reaction CU to the player disrobing off-screen. He takes a step towards the player only to hesitate, as if sensing something.NodeContext: Horny awe. Breaks off at the end, as if sensing something (he's about to involuntarily transform into a bear, out of excitment).

SD_ROM_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Camera focuses on the player reacting with surprise as we hear Halsin turn into a bear off-screen. Once he's transformed, we see him standing on his hind legs, looking bashful. Camera returns to focus on the player as Halsin exits wildshape off-screen. Visual reference for transformations - Similar to DEN_GuardedEntrance_ParentsScene.

SD_ROM_31.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_31.text: Forgive me. I... lost the run of myself. Sometimes, if blood runs hot enough, it's difficult to tame the beast.
SD_ROM_31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin accidentilly transformed into a bear. He is now back in human form

SD_ROM_13.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin had accidentilly transformed into a bear. He is now back in human form

SD_ROM_30.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_30.text: Yes. Change back again. Let me have the beast... and the beast have me.

SD_ROM_25.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_25.text: Are you certain? It will be untamed, vigorous, and, well... large.
SD_ROM_25.context: NodeContext: Hesitant but into it. Player is expressing interest in having sex with him in his bear form (yes, really).

SD_ROM_45.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_45.text: Large is what I'm here for.

SD_ROM_44.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_44.text: Just imagine we're back in the woods... and I'm your prey.

SD_ROM_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin takes a deep breath. Camera focuses on the player's face, excited-scared expression, like they're on a roller-coaster, as Halsin enters bear form offscreen. Their eyeline raises as the shadow of approaching bear-Halsin falls on them.

SD_ROM_40.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Nearby elsewhere, a squirrel scurries along  the undergrowth. It pauses and stares at something offscreen. Suddenly there's a loud bear roar and the squirrel flees into the night.

SD_ROM_50.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_50.text: Another time then, perhaps. Now come here...

SD_ROM_8.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin's eyes very briefly flick downwards at himself as if implying offscreen arousalNodeContext: Erection innuendo intentional

SD_ROM_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin seizes the player and presses them up against the trunk of a tree. He kisses them once again, then sinks to his knees, out of frame. The player gasps and keeps his head down with one hand. Offscreen, Halsin utters a muffled, animalistic growl. Halsin rises to his feet.

SD_ROM_43.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin seizes the player and presses them up against the trunk of a tree. He kisses them once again, then sinks to his knees, out of frame. The player gasps and keeps his head down with one hand. Offscreen, Halsin utters a muffled, animalistic growl. Halsin rises to his feet.

SD_ROM_52.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin seizes the player and presses them up against the trunk of a tree. He kisses them once again, then sinks to his knees, out of frame. The player gasps and keeps his head down with one hand. Offscreen, Halsin utters a muffled, animalistic growl. Halsin rises to his feet.

SD_ROM_17.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player nods. Halsin presses his whole body against theirs, kissing their neck. The camera rises away from them...

... above, the branches of the tree start to shake.

SD_ROM_11.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin seizes the player and presses them up against the trunk of a tree. He kisses them once again, then sinks to his knees, out of frame. The player gasps and keeps his head down with one hand. Offscreen, Halsin utters a muffled, animalistic growl. Halsin rises to his feet.

SD_ROM_0.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player nods. Halsin presses his whole body against theirs, kissing their neck. The camera rises away from them...

... above, the branches of the tree start to shake.

SD_ROM_14.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_14.text: Now that you say it, perhaps this was a mistake. I should leave.

SD_ROM_33.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_33.text: Something to keep in mind for another night. But for now, come here.

SD_ROM_37.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_37.text: Actually... I spoke in haste. I think I should leave.

SD_ROM_9.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_9.text: I'm flattered I have that effect on you. Now come here.

SD_ROM_54.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_54.text: This was a mistake. I think I'd better get dressed...

SD_ROM_26.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_26.text: Ah... I see. Well, of course. Back to camp then.
SD_ROM_26.context: NodeContext: Disappointed but dignified about it.

SD_ROM_56.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] He moves close to the player. They kiss fiercely. The player backs up out of frame to disrobe. Halsin watches hungrily.

SD_ROM_61.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_61.text: You don't have to do this.

SD_ROM_1.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_1.text: Do not misunderstand me. I want this.

SD_ROM_4.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_4.text: You're not wrong. This was a mistake.

SD_ROM_10.speaker: Halsin
SD_ROM_10.text: Oh. If that's what you prefer, so be it.
